greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = 3^min(k, n-k).
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: Table[3^(Min[k, n - k]), {n, 0, 100}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 01 2018 *)
program: (PARI) for(n=0,15, for(k=0,n, print1(3^(min(k,n-k)), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 01 2018
(MAGMA) [[3^(Min(k,n-k)): k in [0..n]]: n in [0..15]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 01 2018
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 11 2008
